description: Scraps of some sort of alien metal of varying sizes, light but tough.  It's quite pretty to look at, silvery with faint blue and green undertones.  Makes a decent weapon in a pinch and is useful for crafting recipes.
This is a sizable portion of fibrous synthetic cloth, flexible and resistant, but unpleasant to the touch.  Useful in crafting.
This is a collection of strange, ivory colored plastics that are unnervingly warm to the touch.  It could be used to fabricate, repair, or reinforce.
A collection of dazzling alien electronics, far beyond anything of terrestrial manufacture.  Useful in crafting.
A fistfull of gently squirming parts that secrete viscous gel.  Useful in crafting, but not fun to hold.

A fist-sized, cylindrical canister that makes you feel a bit tingly when you hold it.  Its center houses a faintly glowing red core of some sort.  Though fundementally incompatable with earthly technologies, it still might be useful in crafting.
A lump of alien hydrogel with small writhing specks in it.  Useful in crafting.  You could 'drink' it, but there's no way it would be pleasant.
